alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Chattooga; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 2:13PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Catoosa, southwestern Whitfield, southeastern Walker and northeastern Chattooga Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 213 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Naomi, or near Lafayette, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, La Fayette, Naomi, Mill Creek, Linwood, Subligna, Suttles Mill, and Villanow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
